009package Ch14_Colorimetric_Color;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.gui.NewImage;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.RgbUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.color.cie.CieUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.color.cie.CieXyPlot;
020import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.sRGB65ColorSpace;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
026import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
027
028import java.awt.Color;
029import java.awt.Shape;
030import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
031import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
032
033import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
034
035/**
036 * ImageJ plugin, takes any RGB color image and plots its color distribution in CIE xy-space, together with the
037 * outline of the xy ("horseshoe") chromaticity curve, sRGB gamut and white point.
038 * Image colors are assumed to be in sRGB.
039 */
040public class Plot_Chromaticity_Chart implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
041
042    private static int ImageSize = 512;
043    private static boolean ShowSrgbGamut = true;
044    private static boolean MarkWhitePoint = true;
045
046    private static final ColorSpace CS = sRGB65ColorSpace.getInstance();
047
048    /**
049     * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
050     */
051    public Plot_Chromaticity_Chart() {
052        if (noCurrentImage()) {
053            DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Flower);
054        }
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
059        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064        if (!runDialog()) {
065            return;
066        }
067
068        ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
069        ImagePlus imPlot =
070                NewImage.createRGBImage("Cie Chromaticity (xy)", ImageSize, ImageSize, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);
071        ColorProcessor cpPlot = (ColorProcessor) imPlot.getProcessor();
072        cpPlot.setColor(Color.lightGray);
073        cpPlot.fill();
074
075        int[] pixels = (int[]) cp.getPixels();
076
077        int[] RGB = new int[3];
078        for (int p : pixels) {
079            // from RGB, calculate XYZ and xy:
080            RgbUtils.decodeIntToRgb(p, RGB);
081            float[] xy = getxy(RGB);
082            int xx = Math.round(xy[0] * ImageSize);
083            int yy = Math.round((1 - xy[1]) * ImageSize);
084
085            // place a brighness-normalized image pixel at the (xy) position:
086            float[] XYZn = CieUtils.xyToXYZ(xy[0], xy[1]);
087            float[] srgbn = CS.fromCIEXYZ(XYZn);
088            int[] RGBn = RgbUtils.denormalize(srgbn);
089            cpPlot.putPixel(xx, yy, RGBn);
090        }
091
092        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
093        Shape xyPlot = new CieXyPlot(ImageSize);
094        ola.addShape(xyPlot, new ColoredStroke(0.35, Color.blue));
095
096        if (ShowSrgbGamut) {
097            float[] xyR = getxy(new int[] {1, 0, 0});
098            float[] xyG = getxy(new int[] {0, 1, 0});
099            float[] xyB = getxy(new int[] {0, 0, 1});
100            Path2D path = new Path2D.Float();
101            path.moveTo(xyR[0] * ImageSize, (1 - xyR[1]) * ImageSize);
102            path.lineTo(xyG[0] * ImageSize, (1 - xyG[1]) * ImageSize);
103            path.lineTo(xyB[0] * ImageSize, (1 - xyB[1]) * ImageSize);
104            path.closePath();
105            ola.addShape(path, new ColoredStroke(0.35, Color.black));
106        }
107
108        if (MarkWhitePoint) {
109            float[] xyW = getxy(new int[] {1, 1, 1});
110            Pnt2d wp = Pnt2d.from(xyW[0] * ImageSize, (1 - xyW[1]) * ImageSize);
111            ola.addShape(wp.getShape(), new ColoredStroke(0.35, Color.black));
112        }
113
114        imPlot.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
115        imPlot.show();
116    }
117
118    private float[] getxy(int[] RGB) {
119        float[] srgb = RgbUtils.normalize(RGB);
120        float[] XYZ = CS.toCIEXYZ(srgb);
121        return CieUtils.XYZToxy(XYZ);
122    }
123
124    private boolean runDialog() {
125        GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
126        gd.addHelp(this.getJavaDocUrl());
127        gd.addCheckbox("Show sRGB gamut", ShowSrgbGamut);
128        gd.addCheckbox("Mark D65 white point", MarkWhitePoint);
129
130        gd.showDialog();
131        if (gd.wasCanceled())
132            return false;
133
134        ShowSrgbGamut = gd.getNextBoolean();
135        MarkWhitePoint = gd.getNextBoolean();
136        return true;
137    }
138}
